title: Configuration for Rush's build cache.
description: For use with the Rush tool, this file provides per-project configuration options. See http://rushjs.io for details.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

extends.description: Optionally specifies another JSON config file that this file extends from. This provides a way for standard settings to be shared across multiple projects.

disableCache.description: NOT RECOMMENDED. Disable caching for this project. The project will never be restored from cache. This may be useful if this project affects state outside of its folder.

optionsForCommands.description: Allows for fine-grained control of cache for individual commands.

disableCache.description: NOT RECOMMENDED. Disable caching for this command. This may be useful if this command for this project affects state outside of this project folder.

projectOutputFolderNames.description: A list of folder names under the project root that should be cached. These folders should not be tracked by git.
